publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 29
ab.l: Miźmoru David́niń maḥtav b́erijiź H-ɣa jyjyny malʾaḫlarnyn maḥtav b́erijiź H-ɣa da ḱuč́ĺu syjyna.
Maḥtav b́erijiź H-ɣa syjly šemi- ńa bašurujuz H-ɣa aziź h́orḿatińa.
Öńu H-nyn ol suvlar üśt́u- ńa ol syjly Teńri ḱokŕat́ti H ḱuč́ĺu suvlar üśt́uńa.
Öńu H-nyn ḱ́uč́ byla öńu H-nyn h́orḿat́ byla.
Öńu H-nyn syndyrdyr ereźĺarni da syndyrdy H ereźĺariń ol Levanonnun.

Da śekirt́ti alarny buzovnu kibik
Levanonnu da tavyn Śirjonnun balalaryn kibik karked́enniń.
Öńu H-nyn keśadir jalynlary kibik otnun.
Öńu H-nyn qaltratadyr öĺeńĺarni da ačadyr ormanlarny da sarajynda anyn barysy aj- tadyr syjyn.
H mabul vaḥtynda qajjamlyɣyn ḱorǵuźd́u da qajjamdyr H Bij dunjaɣa dejiń.
H kiplik ulusuna b́ergej H alɣyšlagej u- lusun bazlyḥ byla.יוָי עוֹז לְעַמוֹ יִתֵן יוָי יְבָרֵךְ אֶת עָמוֹ בַשָלוֹם ׃

app.note: The new verse is not indicated.
